creator: nunoplopes@sapo.pt
text:
I've tried to compile PHP 5.1 as module with apache 2.0.54, but it gives me an 
error in apxs:

Installing PHP SAPI module:       apache2handler
/usr/local/apache2/build/instdso.sh
SH_LIBTOOL='/usr/local/apache2/build/libtool' libphp5.la
/usr/local/apache2/modules
echo
chmod 755 /usr/local/apache2/modules/libphp5.so
chmod: cannot access `/usr/local/apache2/modules/libphp5.so': No such
file or directory
apxs:Error: Command failed with rc=65536
.
make: *** [install-sapi] Error 1

PHP bug: http://bugs.php.net/32946

What are the contents of the /usr/local/apache2/modules directory after this
error?  Please attach the libphp5.la file to the bug report.
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text:
Well, funny..
I had the apache source dir in the /root folder. I've moved it to /cvs/, made 
a ./config.nice && make clean && ./config.nice && make && make install and it 
worked. So, the problems seems to be the apache source dir location..
creator: nunoplopes@sapo.pt

text:
Different partitions?  We have seen some libtool issues with using Hard links
for locking...
creator: chip@force-elite.com
nunoplopes@sapo.pt
text: No. I just have one main partition.

Lacking information on the failure case from the reporter there's nothing more
we can do here; it works fine for me.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
